name: pulverizing-pancake
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user, Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body energetically and attacks the target with full force.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user, Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body energetically and attacks the target with full force.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user, Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body energetically and attacks the target with full force.
